metadata.name: SMB Spoolss Name Piped Usage
metadata.comment: Detects the use of the spoolss named pipe over SMB. This can be used to trigger the authentication via NTLM of any machine that has the spoolservice enabled.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (endswith(lower(file.path), lower('ipc$')) AND lower(file.name) = lower('spoolss'))

output.summary: Detects the use of the spoolss named pipe over SMB. This can be used to trigger the authentication via NTLM of any machine that has the spoolservice enabled.

metadata.objective: False positive: Domain Controllers that are sometimes, commonly although should not be, acting as printer servers too References: https://posts.specterops.io/hunting-in-active-directory-unconstrained-delegation-forests-trusts-71f2b33688e1, https://dirkjanm.io/a-different-way-of-abusing-zerologon/, https://twitter.com/_dirkjan/status/1309214379003588608
